tweet: Calling all Muddles! Follow me! Not a Muddle? So what? Anyone can follow us.
Everyone loved the first book about us so much there's a sequel! Amazon has both Muddles books.
The small white cloud of change drifts across across the sky...
A notice just appeared in the Quad. New Beadle by-laws! Shall I share them?
@biguniverse Changed and not changed! Part of the dilemma when our books came to life.
